H0.text: Taste is the sense that lets Dora know when a skunk has been close to her house.

H1.text: Touch is the sense that lets Dora know when a skunk has been close to her house.

H2.text: Smell is the sense that lets Dora know when a skunk has been close to her house.

H3.text: Hearing lets Dora know when a skunk has been close to her house.

A4.text: Odor, airborne molecules perceived as a scent or aroma

A5.text: Sense of smell, the scent also known scientifically as olfaction
